name: Honk Hard
description:
Honk Hard is a top-down, twin-stick shooter, roguelike-inspired game with a sprinkle of bullet hell, where you’ll collect new weapons and boost your abilities. Play as famous 80s action hero, Goose Willis, in his quest to stop Dr. Vernon Vermin in his track to conquer the world with the help of his evil autonomous army of Robomice. Fend off wave after wave of ruthless machines and progress through the halls of Dr. Vermin's secret underground facility.

Controls:

     WASD or Arrow Keys to move

     Hold RMB to activate bullet time

     Press LBM to fire your weapon

     Press SPACE while holding a direction key to dash in that direction

Game Mechanics:

Dash and Bullet Time:

Goose Willis has two potent abilities in his arsenal. He can quickly dash to change his position, and as a bird with incredible commitment and iron focus, he can slow down time for ten seconds to predict enemies' moves and get out of the toughest of situations. To refill his determination to slow some more, the player will have to finish off enemies with the dash ability. Just deal enough damage to the enemy to trigger their self-destruct sequence, and when you see them blinking, dash into them, destroying them on the spot and refilling that precious determination juice. 

Weapon Upgrades:

Scattered throughout Dr. Vermin's secret facility are special weapon components that when picked up*, can modify Goose's favorite weapon. They can increase bullet speed, the number of bullets the weapon can shoot at once, or even change the properties of those bullets. We don’t want to spoil all the fun for you so we won’t say more. 

Ability Boosts :

Similar to weapon components, these modes boost Goose’s performance. From healthy and toxic-looking vitamin shots to winged boots and so on. But choose wisely which one you’ll pick as the rest will perish when you make up your mind.*

* IMPORTANT INFO

All upgrades come in pairs of two. One pair of ability boosts and one pair of weapon components. You can only pick one of each pair, and when you do, the other will be destroyed and become unobtainable for the rest of the game.
